script_text: Welcome to our product. This revolutionary solution will completely transform the way you work and boost your productivity to new heights.
prompt_text: Speak with enthusiasm and energy, like an excited product announcer

script_text: Limited time offer! Act now and save fifty percent on all premium plans. Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity.
prompt_text: Urgent and persuasive tone, create excitement about the deal

script_text: Thank you so much for choosing our service. We truly appreciate your business and can't wait to help you achieve amazing results.
Call us today at one eight hundred five five five one two three four for a free consultation with our expert team.
prompt_text: Professional and inviting, clear phone number pronunciation
